title: Income rises, marginal rate rises with progressive

content.question: A progressive income tax is characterized by

choices.label: a higher average tax rate at low income levels than at high income levels
tax rates that increase total tax revenues
marginal tax rates that do not change as income changes
marginal tax rates that increase as income increases
marginal tax rates that decrease as income increases

content.answer: marginal tax rates that increase as income increases
